name: LcnPy
short_description:
This package represents a Python API for the LocalControlNetwork (LCN) by Issendorff. Central element is a software bus which emulates the LCN hardware bus. Virtual LCN-modules (represented by Python Objects) can connect to the software bus and send/receive/react to LCN telegrams. Virtual coupler modules give access to the LCN telegrams, e.g. for coupling the software bus via a serial port to the hardware bus (via a LCN-PK/U), for TCP/IP routing or for simple logging purposes.
This package bases on the GnuLCN project (written in Java) with a lot of enhancements.
